GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.19.8
GSD.description:
openvswitch: fix memory leak at failed datapath creation

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.8 by commit c0c1c0241917459644326a1a3102207c871ae159, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit b83d23a2a38b1770da0491257ae81d52307f7816. For more details please see the references link.
